#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int s(int n)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {int x=n%10;
        if(x%2==0)
        sum+=2*x;
        else
            sum+=x;
        n/=10;
    }
return sum%10;
}

main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a,b,sum=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        while(a%10!=0)
        {
            sum+=s(a);
            ++a;
        }
        while(b%10!=0)
        {
            sum+=s(b);
            --b;
        }
        sum+=((b-a)/10)*45;
        sum+=s(b);
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }


    return 0;
}
